pullRequest.title: Private deck due tree node
pullRequest.bodyText:
deckDueTreeNode's member become private. That's a start of a change made for #6522, as requested by @david-allison-1 .
I also added a few methods which makes more sens than getter

nodes.bodyText: Optional: could factor this into hasNewCards()
⚠️  This has been changed from names[0] to names.length - 1 in some places. I don't feel this is correct, but I haven't read the context of the code.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -178,30 +178,30 @@
      * this field and use names[0] for those cases.

nodes.bodyText: Maybe factor this into a method
Could this be abstracted. Maybe use getNames() instead of getName(). It implies the string length rather than the array length.
